hanzi-su-wiki:
璧

Значения

Круглая пластина из нефрита

Мнемоника

Круглый кусок нефрита 玉 с открытым 辟 отверстием в центре.

Варианты

壁
purpleculture_pinyin:
bì
jade annulus
нефритовое кольцо
rtega_mnemonic:
璧璧RSround and flat piece of jade with a circular hole in it,
  • precious stone of jade 玉 so priceless men want to have their head cut off 辟 for it
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 辟 indicates the sound; 玉 (jade) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
合璧 [ hé bì ]: to match harmoniously
珠联璧合 [ zhū lián bì hé ]: string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination; perfect pair
中西合璧 [ zhōng xī hé bì ]: harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
完璧归赵 [ wán bì guī zhào ]: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
白璧微瑕 [ bái bì wēi xiá ]: a slight blemish
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 辟 [ pì ] law, rule; to open up, to develop
    • 玉 [ yù ] jade, gem, precious stone
heisig_story: The holed gem to which this kanji refers is a flat, circular object of about a foot in length, made of stone or glass and having a large hole in the middle. It's elements: ketchup . . . ball.
koohiiStory1: Even more valuable and perfect (完璧) than a holed gem is a delicious meatball (ball = たま = 玉) with ketchup. Yum!
koohiiStory2: It's a little known fact that ketchup is highly corrosive and is used to cut holes into gemstones so they can be put onto chains. This kanji shows a piece of Jade with a blob of ketchup on the top eating a hole through it.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 癖 (くせ、ヘキ манера, привычка), 壁 (かべ、ヘキ стена), 碧 (みどり、ヘキ лазурный)
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 尸 (труп), 王 (монарх), 立 (стоять), 辛 (острый на вкус)
Ru_trainchinese: bì: (сущ) круглый и плоский кусок нефрита с отверстием в центре
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the jewel (玉) made by the rule (辟) is an ancient Chinese artifact
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from " Jade ", " provision of " sound, " the provision of " word in a small circle (◎) Biyu like the shape, and " Jade " are all righteous character, the original meaning is Biyu.

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning, Huanzi and Meng Jianghu: "In Nangongzi, two pieces are used. Two pieces of jade are used." It also means Biyong, which is equivalent to "Piyong" in classics, which is an ancient university. Mai Zun: "Only (in) Biyong." Biyong is a circle-shaped pool with a round land in the middle, "Poetry. Daya. "Lingtai Poetry Preface" commented and quoted "Han Shi Shuo", "The one who built the scorpion, the emperor's learning, round like a bi, and the emperor takes water."

"Shuowen": "Bi, Ruiyu 圜ye. From the jade to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: ""Shiqi": "The meat is better than the bi", the side is big and the hole is small."
humanum_short_description_en: From the Bronze " Jade ", " provision of " sound, " the provision of " word in a small circle (◎) Biyu like the shape, and " Jade " are all righteous character, the original meaning is Biyu.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「玉」，「辟」聲，「辟」字中的小圓圈(◎)象璧玉之形，與「玉」皆為義符，本義是璧玉。

　　金文用作本義，洹子孟姜壺：「于南宮子用璧二備。玉二𤔲。」又表示璧雝，相當於典籍之「辟雍」，即是古代的大學。麥尊：「才(在)璧雝。」璧雝是一個圓圈形水池，中間有一塊圓形土地，《詩．大雅．靈臺詩序》注疏引《韓詩說》「辟廱者，天子之學，圓如璧，雍之以水」。

　　《說文》：「璧，瑞玉圜也。从玉辟聲。」段玉裁注：「《釋器》：『肉倍好謂之璧』，邊大孔小也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「玉」，「辟」聲，「辟」字中的小圓圈(◎)象璧玉之形，與「玉」皆為義符，本義是璧玉。

金文從「 玉 」，「 辟 」聲，「 辟 」字中的小圓圈(◎)象璧玉之形，與「 玉 」皆為義符，本義是璧玉。 金文用作本義，洹子孟姜壺：「于南宮子用璧二備。玉二𤔲。」又表示璧雝，相當於典籍之「辟雍」，即是古代的大學。麥尊：「才(在)璧雝。」璧雝是一個圓圈形水池，中間有一塊圓形土地，《詩．大雅．靈臺詩序》注疏引《韓詩說》「辟廱者，天子之學，圓如璧，雍之以水」。 《說文》：「璧，瑞玉圜也。从玉辟聲。」段玉裁注：「《釋器》：『肉倍好謂之璧』，邊大孔小也。」
Inscriptions from " Jade", " provision of" sound, " the provision of" word in a small circle (◎) Biyu like the shape, and " Jade" are all righteous character, the original meaning is Biyu. Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning, Huanzi and Meng Jianghu: "In Nangongzi, two pieces are used. Two pieces of jade are used." It also means Biyong, which is equivalent to "Piyong" in classics, which is an ancient university. Mai Zun: "Only (in) Biyong." Biyong is a circle-shaped pool with a round land in the middle, "Poetry. Daya. "Lingtai Poetry Preface" commented and quoted "Han Shi Shuo", "The one who built the scorpion, the emperor's learning, round like a bi, and the emperor takes water." "Shuowen": "Bi, Ruiyu 圜ye. From the jade to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: ""Shiqi": "The meat is better than the bi", the side is big and the hole is small."

璧字的基本解释

璧
bì
平圆形中间有孔的玉，古代在典礼时用作礼器，亦可作饰物。
美玉的通称：璧人（即“玉人”，指容貌秀美的人）。璧日（像璧玉一样圆而亮的太阳）。璧月。

璧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》必益切，入昔，幫。］
(1)玉器名。扁平、圆形、中心有孔。边阔大于孔径。古代贵族用作朝聘、祭祀、丧葬时的礼器，也作佩带的装饰。
(2)泛指美玉。
(3)指归还赠礼或借物。
(4)喻月亮。
(5)通“壁”。参见“璧奎”、“璧帶”。

璧字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璧； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页742第29
【唐韻】北激切【集韻】【韻會】必益切【正韻】必歷切，?音辟。【說文】瑞玉，圜器也。【玉篇】瑞玉圜以象天也。【白虎通】璧者，外圜象天，內方象地。【詩·衞風】如圭如璧。【爾雅·釋器】肉倍好謂之璧。【註】肉，邊也。好，孔也。　又星名。【詩·衞風·定之方中疏】璧居南則在室東，故因名東璧也。通作辟。　又【韻補】叶必洛切，音近博。【江淹·擬曹植雜詩】君王禮英賢，不吝千金璧。從容冰井臺，淸池映華薄。

璧字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璧字的起名意思

：平圆形中间有孔的玉；美玉，指容貌秀美的人。

Bi
Basic explanation of words
Bi
bì
The jade with a hole in the middle of the flat circle was used as a ritual vessel in ceremonies in ancient times, and it can also be used as an ornament.
The general name of Meiyu: Biren (ie, "Jade Man", refers to a person with beautiful appearance). Biri (the sun as round and bright as Biyu). Biyue.
Bi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guang Yun" must benefit from cutting, into the past, help. ]
(1) The name of the jade article. Flat, round, with a hole in the center. The side width is larger than the aperture. The ancient nobles used them as ritual vessels for imperial appointments, sacrifices, and funerals, as well as decorations to wear.
(2) Generally refers to beautiful jade.
(3) Refers to the return of gifts or loans.
(4) Yu Moon.
(5) Through the "wall". See "Bikui", "Bidai".
Bi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　bi; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 742 29
[Tang Yun] Bei Jiqi cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Must benefit cut [Zheng Yun] Must experience cut,? Yinpi. [Said the text] Ruiyu is also a tool. [Jade articles] Ruiyu round is like the sky. 【Baihutong】Bi, the outer circle is like the sky, the inner square is like the earth. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Rugui like bi. [Erya·Release Device] Roubei can be described as a bi. [Note] Meat, side also. Okay, Kong too.　Also star name. 【Poetry·Weifeng·Dingzhi Fangzhongshu】Biju's south is in the east of the room, so it is named Dongbi. All-in-one.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Biluoqie, the sound is close to Bo. 【Jiang Yan·Miscellaneous Poems of Cao Zhi】The king is Li Yingxian, and he is not stingy with his daughter. Calmly Bingjing Terrace, Cheongchi reflects Huali.

Bi
Name meaning
: A jade with a hole in the middle of a flat circle; a beautiful jade refers to a person with a beautiful appearance.
bì
I сущ.
1) кольцеобразная яшмовая регалия, клейнод; плоское кольцо из яшмы
璧琮 яшмовые регалии князя и княгини
2) яшма, нефрит; яшмовый; украшенный яшмой
璧台 украшенная яшмой башня
璧假 брать под залог яшмы
3) кольцеобразный, круглый
璧池 кольцеобразный пруд
璧日 солнечный диск
4) * вм. 璧 (стена)
5) *вм. 襞 (складка)
II гл.
1) * вежливо отказаться от подарка, учтиво вернуть поднесенное
璧回 возвращать, отклонять (подарок)
2) * копить, собирать
III собств.
Би (фамилия)
